room_title: Escape room "Apartment A" by Murfreesboro Escape Room in Murfreesboro
review: Grand kids, ages 13 and 18 had a good time. Grandma and Grandpa stood around amazed at how quickly they found and figured out the clues. Very impressed with the designer of this particular room.

room_title: Escape room "Apartment A" by Murfreesboro Escape Room in Murfreesboro
review: My family, ranging in ages from 8 years old to adult, had a great time in the Apt A escape room. It was a great quality room with interesting puzzles at just the right level of difficulty for a group that had not done escape rooms before. We made it out with two clues and five minutes to spare. We will definitely return to try out one of their other rooms. Recommended!

room_title: Escape room "Apartment A" by Murfreesboro Escape Room in Murfreesboro
review: This was our first visit to an escape room, and we went into "Apartment A". It took us a few minutes to get the first clue. We needed the problem solving skills of all 3 of us (3 generations ranging from teen to a grandfather) to get the clues. We would be cheering and laughing and then try to be very analytical in solving the next clue. Although we didn't escape in the allotted time it was still a wonderful and memorable experience.
